text:
Hello there :slightly_smiling_face:
i have questions about pricing,
which package subscription we need for creating *UI-extensions* (in React) with HubSpot ?
Can we use that kind of integrations without the Marketing Hub Enterprise ?

Thanks a lot !

I believe Sales Hub or Service Hub Enterprise is required to create UI Extensions: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview>

Hello.

I have a project with a `ui-extension` and a `serverless-function` .  When "developing locally" the `ui-extension` works great EXCEPT for calling the local `serverless-function` that is part of the project/extension.    The only error in the console is a 403.

Is it possible to test both the `ui-extension` and the `serverless-function` locally?  or do I need to upload every change and test in staging (gross)?
i do have the private app access token in the .env.local
